definition: perennial subshrub of the Canary Islands having usually pale yellow daisylike flowers
details:
noun
- perennial subshrub of the Canary Islands having usually pale yellow daisylike flowers
= synonyms: marguerite daisy
- tall leafy-stemmed Eurasian perennial with white flowers
= synonyms: oxeye daisy, ox-eyed daisy, moon daisy, white daisy
